inclusion.criterion: clinically and radiologically diagnosed with acute cholecystitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ultrasound revealed several gallstones and biliary sludge

exclusion.criterion: acute pancreatitis, cholangitis or choledochal stone with acute cholecystitis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: having a previous history of upper abdominal surgery
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of previous upper abdominal surgery

notes: 45-year-old woman with clinically and radiologically diagnosed acute cholecystitis, no contraindications for elective cholecystectomy.
